itemDescription: Welsh cricketer who played for Glanmorgan (1942-2014)

wikipedia_page.main: Euros John Lewis (31 January 1942 – 23 June 2014) was a  Welsh cricketer. Lewis was a left-handed batsman who bowled right-arm off break. He was born at Llanelli, Carmarthenshire.

link_mentions.page: List of Glamorgan County Cricket Club players

response: *Euros Lewis - Agor y Llen ar y Ddrama Gymraeg
* 23 June – Euros Lewis, 72, cricketer (Glamorgan and Sussex).
*Euros Lewis, 72, Welsh cricketer (Glamorgan, Sussex).Glamorgan pay tribute to former all-rounder Euros Lewis
